attributes.action: put his money where his mouth is in respect of Global Warming and require all ministers to use public transport where practicable, bicycles, electric cars and if absolutely necessary petrol driven cars with an engine capacity no greater than 800cc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister should recognise that the greatest threat to the planet comes from hot air generated by politicians on the subject of Global Warming.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
